meanings.sent1: The caterpillar is evolving into a butterfly.
meanings.sent2: Technology is constantly evolving to meet our needs.
meanings.sent3: The plan was evolving so slowly, it seemed like it was taking a nap.
meanings.sent4: Her painting style is evolving like a flower blooming in spring.
meanings.sent5: The city skyline was evolving before our eyes, growing taller and more impressive each day.

meanings.sent1: The tadpole is evolving into a frog.
meanings.sent2: People's tastes in music are always evolving over time.
meanings.sent3: The story of the talking dog was evolving into a comedy of errors.
meanings.sent4: His ideas were evolving like a storm brewing on the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The landscape was evolving, shifting and changing with each passing season.

meanings.definition: To come forth gradually into being; develop.
meanings.sent1: The new species is evolving in the isolated jungle.
meanings.sent2: Her skills are evolving as she practices every day.
meanings.sent3: The mystery novel was evolving into a thrilling page-turner.
meanings.sent4: His personality was evolving like a flower opening up to the sun.
meanings.sent5: The idea was evolving in his mind, growing clearer and more defined with each passing moment.
